snippet: Britain’s Kell Brook, the International Boxing Federation welterweight champion, says he is determined to resurrect his career after being stabbed while on vacation in early September.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s Kell Brook, the International Boxing Federation welterweight champion, says he is determined to resurrect his career after being stabbed while on vacation in early September.

headline.main: Fighter Says Stabbing Won’t Derail Career
headline.print_headline: Fighter Says Stabbing Won’t Derail Career
